DOC.brief_summary: In phase 1 pilot study , positron emission tomography ( PET/CT ) imaging use determine biodistribution , metabolism excretion novel radiotracer [ 18F ] Fluortriopride ( [ 18F ] FTP ) .
DOC.detailed_description: [ 18F ] FTP novel radioactive tracer show potential labeling dopamine D3 receptor PET/CT imaging . This phase 1 study design meant evaluate safety , biodistribution brain uptake [ 18F ] FTP healthy volunteer .
